name: Fruit Bombs
description:
In this simple game, the goal is to collect all the fruits and avoid the bombs. Earn 10, 20, 50, 75 points and beat your records!

  • Bananas give 10 points
  • Apples 20 points
  • Grapes 50 points
  • Watermelon 75 points.

Bombs also affect points, in fact they take away 50 points every time they are touched!

ENGINE

I used Construct 2, a 2D event engine. 

The project was completed in 2 hours for a challenge, for this reason the music is not present in the game.

IMPORTANT: the game does not work on mobile devices

ENDLESS

The game is endless! If you want to share your high score you can do it in the comments.  My highest score is 7500, beat me if you can :)
